2.3.name: wordpress/gwa-autoresponder
2.3.description:
Build your mailing list right from your Wordpress Weblog. Subscribe and manage your entire list directly and automatically with Wordpress.

  • Build a list of unlimited size
  • Send daily email auto-responses
  • Easy to add, edit, and reschedule mailings
  • Send single messages to your list anytime
  • Import/Export entire list format
